price: Sois vós que fazeis surgir sua árvore, ou somos Nós Que a fazemos surgir?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
